::Hot Rod::

He stood ready for combat the minute Unitron or another Alliance bot
came out.

::DrillBit::

He saw Megatron still attacking Killfest. He opened gattaling gun fire
on Megatron.

::Demolition::

He shot the wall frame around the force field untill it was to out of
shape to project the field. Between this and the low power, the field
collapsed. He turned to Imprisoner, Predator, and Choran.
"Come on we got to move. Unitron will be here shortly."

::Epyon::

He returned the bridge and gazed out apon the Atlantic ocean. it was a
wounderful site. But what he had seen when passing the CF was a problem.
There was a battle, and it didn't look good for the Maximals. He opened
up channels on the commlink and sub space Maximal radio.
"Maximals. This is Captain Epyon, of the Maximal ship StarJumper. We are
currently landing on the planet. What is the situation and do you
require immediat assistance?"
He sent it out on all Maximal channels, incodded.
